scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build/bot.js
scripts.get_build: git fetch origin && git reset --hard origin/build && npm run copy_auth
scripts.copy_auth: shx touch build/auth.json && shx cp ../auth.json build/auth.json
scripts.back_auth: shx touch src/auth.json && shx cp ../auth.json src/auth.json
scripts.delete_branch: git push origin --delete build && git branch -D build
scripts.push_to_remote: git add . && git commit -m 'build' && git push --set-upstream origin build && git checkout master
scripts.setup_build: npm run build && npm run delete_branch && npm run create_branch && npm run change_gitignore && npm run remove_src && npm run remove_tsconfig && npm run push_to_remote && npm run back_auth
scripts.production_bot_start: npm run get_build && npm run prod_start
scripts.production_bot_restart_with_updates: npm run get_build && pm2 restart nora
